casebody.data:
SHEPARD
v.
OCWEN FEDERAL BANK, et al. No. 476A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2005. Maria D. McIntyre, Charlotte, Chandra T. Taylor, for Wayne & Rosemary Shepard. William Walt Pettit, Charlotte, Matthew T. McKee, for Ocwen Federal Bank, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of September *6802005 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to file Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (Wayne & Rosemary Shepard) shall have up to and including the 11th day of October 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of September 2005."
